fields.subject: Incident 1: Patient Fall
fields.description: Patient slipped near the main entrance causing minor bruises. Immediate assessment performed.

fields.additional_info: Patient fell near the lobby; no major injuries, follow-up required.

fields.subject: Incident 2: Medication Error
fields.description: A dosage error occurred during medication administration in the ICU. Corrective measures implemented.

fields.additional_info: Dosage recalculated and administered correctly; incident under review.

fields.subject: Incident 3: Equipment Failure
fields.description: Medical ventilator malfunctioned in the ICU, prompting an immediate technical inspection.

fields.additional_info: Ventilator replaced; maintenance log updated and staff re-trained.

fields.subject: Incident 4: Staffing Shortage
fields.description: Unexpected staffing shortage in the Emergency Department led to service delays.

fields.additional_info: Staffing levels restored after emergency call; incident documented for future scheduling.

fields.subject: Incident 5: Diagnostic Delay
fields.description: Delay in processing radiology results affected timely treatment decisions.

fields.additional_info: Delayed imaging resolved; further monitoring scheduled.

fields.subject: Incident 120: Facility Maintenance Request
fields.description: Routine maintenance request for facility upgrades in patient areas, including lighting and HVAC improvements.

fields.additional_info: Maintenance completed with minimal disruption; follow-up inspection scheduled.
